## Crosstalk with filters

Taken from https://rstudio.github.io/crosstalk/using.html

```{r Crosstalk with filters, echo=TRUE}
shared_mtcars <- SharedData$new(mtcars)
shared_quakes <- SharedData$new(quakes[sample(nrow(quakes), 100),])
#head(quakes)
#head(mtcars)
bscols(widths = c(3,NA),
  list(
    filter_checkbox("mag", "Magnitude", shared_quakes, ~mag, inline = TRUE),
    #    filter_select("yes-no", "Yes-No question", shared_quakes, ~ifelse(am == 0, "Yes", "No")),
    filter_slider("lat", "Latitude", shared_quakes, ~lat, width = "100%"),
    filter_slider("long", "Longitude", shared_quakes, ~long, width = "100%")
  ),
  leaflet(shared_quakes, width = "100%", height = 300) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers()
)
```
